translations: n．钦佩者，仰慕者：对某人或某事表示钦佩、敬仰或喜爱的人。

sentences.sentence: The general was an unattractive man to all but his most ardent admirers.
sentences.translation: 除了他的那些最热切的仰慕者以外，这位将军对于其他人并无吸引力。

sentences.sentence: She dresses down in dark glasses and baggy clothes to avoid hordes of admirers.
sentences.translation: 她着装随意，戴墨镜，穿宽松的衣服，以避开大群的仰慕者。

sentences.sentence: She never married but had many admirers.
sentences.translation: 她从未结婚，不过追求者不少。
